document_data.name: Eldovar Fleetleaf
document_data.mainbody: dovar had light skin and long black hair. He wore rugged and practical clothing and carried a [[walking stick]] as he traversed the wilderness.
document_data.Description: Eldovar had light skin and long black hair. He wore rugged and practical clothing and carried a [[walking stick]] as he traversed the wilderness.
document_data.Personality: He had a rather poor opinion of [[adventurer]]s, and prided himself on his specialized wilderness knowledge and professionalism.
document_data.History: Around the mid-1480s [[DR]], Eldovar offered his services as a guide to people in the Storm Horns, but strongly preferred people who had proven themselves competent already. He was willing to take completely clueless people, but it required a significant payment for his time and effort.
